name: Nicecapade: Romp of Virtue
description:
Hey! We didn't have time to resolve all the bugs in the browser version, but we uploaded it anyways, so as many people as possible could play. Maybe consider playing the downloadable version instead, if you can?

Play as the world's most pure-hearted knight, and see if you can take out all the evil you attract! With 6 worlds and multiple paths, can you rid the world of all villainy?

-- Controls --

Use your mouse to direct your shield. Click to swipe your sword.

-- Tips --

Keep an eye out for any torches! They might lead you somewhere new...

Depending on which part of your shield you use, you can control the direction you bounce enemies.
